message:
OK let's do the first development of the phone application based on the mockups that we've done it should work on both Android and Apple so have those downloads available so we can download it and review it and play with it on our devices at the moment I just want to have the app working my client mainly to work on it further for the security and updates to embed within the application for now can you have a button that we'll just go straight into the application when you hit the Microsoft button because my client can update and access because he's got access to the Microsoft system at the moment which I don't so we want to get the app working on both Android and Apple can you also once you complete it do a analysis of what we need to do to get it approved on both Android and Apple download systems and create a PDF

---
[AGENT MODE: Review] Use the Task tool with subagent_type="general-purpose" to perform code review. Check for bugs, security issues, and improvements.

/orchestrate
activity: 3 agents working: Generate approval guide PDF
